medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started two weeks ago as diffuse pain, which then moved to the mid pelvis region. It is described as sharp and crampy, worse when lying on her sides and after defecation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Myasthenia diagnosed in ___, 2. Multiple spinal compression fractures s/p steroid use for MG, 3. Hypercholesterolemia, 4. History of migraines, 5. Seasonal allergies, 6. Hypertension, 7. Osteoporosis
medical_history.family_history: Mother: Myocardial infarction x2, CHF, deceased; Father: Rheumatic heart disease, CVA, deceased; Sister died of insulin dependent diabetes mellitus with pneumonia.
